Athens, the birthplace of democracy and philosophy, showcases iconic landmarks like the Acropolis, where the Parthenon stands in timeless grandeur. Delve into the city's vibrant neighborhoods and museums, each echoing tales of antiquity. Then the Cyclades, where whitewashed villages against azure waters beckon. From the cosmopolitan charm of Mykonos to the volcanic beauty of Santorini's caldera, each island offers its own allure. Experience rich history, picturesque landscapes, and warm hospitality, blending the essence of ancient and modern Greece in an unforgettable adventure. Standard Room (10 Nights) Travel Dates: 27 Jun - 18 Oct 26 Twin per person fr $5,010 Travel Dates: 4 Jun - 25 Jun 26 Twin per person fr $4,822 Travel Dates: 25 Apr - 21 May 26 & 1 Oct - 15 Oct 26 Twin per person fr $4,476 Travel Dates: 2 Apr - 23 Apr 26 & 16 Oct - 25 Oct 26 Twin per person fr $4,372 Note: *Price excludes a Climate crisis resilience tax and is payable direct to hotel. Departs: Saturday & Thursday and some Sundays between 02 Apr-25 Oct 26 except 09, 19 April 2026 ^Discount is already applied and no further discounts apply Starts: Athens Ends: Athens Includes 10 days Classical Greece & Cyclades in Standard Class hotel accommodation including: - 3 nights at Athens Dorian Inn (3 star) in a Standard Room - 4 Day/3 Night organised Seat in Coach Classical tour including stays in Olympia, Delphi and Kalambaka - 2 nights at Kamari Hotel Mykonos (3 star) in a Standard Room - 2 nights at Kamari Beach Santorini (3 star) in a Standard Room - Buffet breakfast daily - 3 Dinners - Arrival and departure transfers in Athens, Mykonos and Santorini - Ferry tickets Piraeus-Mykonos, in economy class. - Fast Ferry tickets Mykonos-Santorini, in economy class. - Flight Santorini-Athens, including taxes. Per Person, from $4,372 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 31 Jan 2026. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 1 Jan 2026 to 31 Oct 2026 (unless otherwise specified).Land only, airfares are additional Climate Crisis Resilience Tax. - 5-star hotels: From April to October the amount is 15 Euro per room per night. From November to March the amount is 4 Euro per room per night. - 4-star hotels: From April to October the amount is 10 Euro per room per night. From November to March the amount is 3 Euro per room per night. - 3-star hotels: From April to October the amount is 5 Euro per room per night. From November to March the amount is 1,50 Euro per room per night. * Payable upon arrival directly to the hotel by the client. Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Capacity limitations apply and may not be available on all services. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For split stays please contact your travel consultant. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. ISSUE DATE: .
